nodes.bodyText: I was thinking that when we allow split, that the first region would no longer have a regionid of '1'. Rather, it would have the 'natural' number, the hash, as user-space regions have. Old clients would keep referring to the old region name w/ the replicaid of '1'... We use this fact figuring when to put up the facade over hbase:meta for old clients to use.
OK, let's remove the specific region id now. Later let's see if it is possible to keep compatible for old clients.
Oh, this is not easy. We have special code for dealing with meta region. Can be another issue I think.
Need this? Don't we have enough spew in log already around assign?
Oh, this is a debug log. Let me remove.
